channel.title: How i change 1 connect per ip?
channel.description:
Yes im using the source "PvP Planet V1" and when i try connect whit 2 accs it says That someone is already connected by my ip (Yea im online) But i want to delete it and add like 10000connects per ip (example). ( I connect whit 1 acc then I connect whit the other one)
The source is a richscape based
Yes if you can't help(Dont understand) Heres the link and help me how to delete the 1 connect per ip. http://rapidshare.com/files/179376257/PVP_Palacev1.zip

item.title: How i change 1 connect per ip?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:4, topic:281129”]Search for:

if(connectionsFromIP(connectionHost)

and replace the whole line with:

if(connectionsFromIP(connectionHost) < 1001) {[/quote] I searched for that and that doenst even work. The source is wierd :S

Read full topic
